name: Screwfix
description: UK's largest direct and online supplier of trade tools, accessories and hardware products. Omnichannel retailer serving tradespeople through 900+ stores, online, mobile app, and phone ordering. Owned by Kingfisher plc. Pioneered ultra-convenience model with Click & Collect in 1 minute and 60-minute Sprint delivery. ~75% of customers are businesses.
notes: Established UK trade retailer, subsidiary of Kingfisher plc (LSE listed). Key areas to research: competitive positioning vs B&Q/Toolstation/Amazon, unit economics of store expansion (900+ stores, targeting 1000), Sprint delivery economics and penetration, international expansion (Ireland, France), margin profile for trade-focused retail, customer acquisition and retention metrics, technology investment in omnichannel capabilities.
